attributes.action: Congratulate Rangers football club on Reaching the UEFA Cup Final
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rangers have made an unprecedented gain in European football having played 16 ties all over Europe. This achievement has culminated in Rangers reaching a final at the City of Manchester stadium. The people of Manchester should extend their hands in friendship and welcome this great football team and fans with open arms.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
